name: Dreamer
description: Each night, choose a player (not yourself or Travellers): you learn 1 good and 1 evil character, 1 of which is correct.
first_night_desc: The Dreamer points to a player. Show 1 good and 1 evil character token; one of these is correct.
second_night_dec: The Dreamer points to a player. Show 1 good and 1 evil character token; one of these is correct.
